home.title: legal portal for foreign citizens
home.description: Legal portal 【Global Guide Service】 for foreigners☝️ Legal advice and assistance to foreigners in Ukraine✔️ Legal advice⚡ Global Chat⭐ Legal advice and support

service.title: consultations and legal assistance in Ukraine
service.desc1: registration with the help of 【Global Guide Service】 ➤➤➤
service.desc2: legal assistance⚡ Accompanying a lawyer✔️ Assistance in collecting documents✍ Minimum processing time⌚️

footer.content: LLC «GLOBAL GUIDE SERVICE» is the guarantor of your legal security in Ukraine.

requests.civilRegistryOffices: Requests to the Civil Registry Offices (registration of civil status acts)
requests.ministryOfInternalAffairs: Requests to the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine (MIA)
requests.internallyDisplacedPersons: Requests related to internally displaced persons (IDPs)
requests.pensionFund: Requests to the Pension Fund of Ukraine (PFU) and the State Border Guard Service of Ukraine (SBGS)
requests.ministryOfDefense: Requests to the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and Territorial Recruitment Centers (TRCs)
requests.stateMigrationService: Requests to the State Migration Service of Ukraine (SMSU) and the Administration of SBGS

validForm.password: * The password must contain at least 6 digits!

microdatas.explanationsAbout: Links on the Global Guide Service website
